sentences.sContent: If the Pope's initiative succeeds, the Church of England will be further weakened and plunged into even greater disarray.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the Pope's initiative succeeds, the Church of England will be further weakened and plunged into even greater disarray.
sentences.sCn: 如果教皇的倡议倡议获得成功，英国教会将进一步削弱并陷入到更大的混乱中。

synos.tran: 使混乱；弄乱；使脱去衣服

remMethod.val: dis(离开) + array(排列) → 没有进行排列 → 无秩序
